TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time
SummaryEnglish: Upon winning a fighting tournament and being crowned the world’s strongest warrior, Peter Grill discovers a downside to his newfound fame. Women of all species, from ogres to elves, are scrambling over each other for his seed to ensure they have the strongest babies possible. Poor Peter just wants to settle down with his lovey dovey fiancée, but he’ll have to outmatch, outwit, and outrun a harem of very determined monster girls to do so!
Aliases: Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan
Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan: Super Extra

1.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Ogre Sisters
1.SummaryEnglish: As the strongest man in the world, Peter must rise to the occasion and fend off not one, but two ogresses who want his peter.

2.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Future Father-in-Law
2.SummaryEnglish: Peter's situation just keeps getting worse. The orgresses were a handful enough, but now he's facing the wrath of a pissed off future father-in-law!

3.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and Relationships with Elves
3.SummaryEnglish: Lisa warned Peter that other nations would soon proposition him. Waking up and finding an elf in his bed proves she was right.

4.SummaryEnglish: Please seek immediate elven attention for curses lasting more than four hours.

5.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and a Blind Date with an Orc
5.SummaryEnglish: The guildmaster’s latest scheme involves a political marriage between Peter and an ugly orc. Peter thinks he’s safe from temptation, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

6.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Orc's True Character
6.SummaryEnglish: Peter’s in quite the pickle this time. On one hand, he knows exactly what the guildmaster is trying to do. But on the other, Piglette really wants Peter to pick her pepper.

7.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Battle of the Fates
7.SummaryEnglish: What do ogres, orcs and elves all have in common? They hate each other. Peter has absolutely no idea what he’s gotten himself into.

8.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Secret Treaty
8.SummaryEnglish: All Peter wants is a romantic date with Luvellia. Is that too much to ask? Why yes, yes it is.

9.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Treaty's Aftermath
9.SummaryEnglish: Peter can't take it any longer and is about to crack like an egg!

10.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Angry Megaton Axe
10.SummaryEnglish: Lisa's past finally catches up to her and Peter gets caught in the fallout. Why? Because life is contractually obligated to give him a hard time, that's why.

11.SummaryEnglish: Why Peter, you wouldn't be thinking about throwing the match, right? Who knows what could happen if your ill-advised plan to get rid of the Ogre sisters were to backfire...

12.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Warrior that Shouted Love
12.SummaryEnglish: Peter has no choice. If he wants to rid himself of Lisa once and for all, he must become the ultimate wingman and help Spartokos get laid.

1.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Goblin Apocalypse
1.SummaryEnglish: Did someone say goblins? Peter just received orders to hold back a horde of female goblins invading the countryside.

2.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Goblin Who Returned the Favor
2.SummaryEnglish: While Peter weeps in his cell, an Elite Hobgoblin named Gobuko unexpectedly comes to his rescue. It’s almost as though she’s got something on her mind…

3.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Only Neat Thing to Do
3.SummaryEnglish: When humans successfully route the horde, is extermination the only solution? This looks like a job for a completely different kind of goblin slayer!

4.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the World's Strongest Little Sister
4.SummaryEnglish: Lucy Grill certainly has a lot of guts. Why, she’ll just go berserk if she ever finds out her brother cheated on Luvellia!

5.SummaryEnglish: Peter's already complicated life grows more so when Lucy joins the Warrior Guild. He needs to be extra careful now!

6.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Enjoyment of the Spa Resort
6.SummaryEnglish: Peter needs a break after everything he’s gone through. Unfortunately for him, certain someones have other plans.

7.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and a Family Disgraced
7.SummaryEnglish: After being abducted from the spa resort, Peter awakens and stands before Vegan’s sister! Three guesses what she wants.

8.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Sisterly Feud
8.SummaryEnglish: Vegan won’t just stand around and let her sister take Peter away!

9.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Essence of an Apology
9.SummaryEnglish: Vegan and Fulltalia's sibling rivalry is getting out of hand!

10.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Dwarven Alliance
10.SummaryEnglish: The Guildmaster vows to acknowledge Peter if he reaffirms the Guild’s alliance with the Dwarves? Peter smells a trap...

11.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Inescapable Room
11.SummaryEnglish: Peter and Misslim get locked in a room together, and the only way they can escape is by performing a suspiciously specific action…

12.TitleEnglish: Peter Grill and the Future Legacy
12.SummaryEnglish: The Guildmaster's plan pays off! Fortunately for Peter (but unfortunately for everyone else), the Dwarves' natural predator chooses this moment to attack the ceremony.
